content: this legal text summarizes a case titled vsc sklep cp 4162020 regarding compensation the case was filed on november 26 2020 and the case number is vsc00041936 the final resolution upholds the judgment from the first instance the goods involved in the case include a cash bank account with a sum of 1640696 eur and unpaid pension benefits of 6506 eur the division of assets prioritizes paying off higher debts owed to the municipality the court appeal was successful and the contested order was changed specifically paragraph 3 point the court made a judgment regarding the inheritance of a deceased person determining that 23 of the social assistance received for residential care amounting to 4887901 eur will be deducted from the inheritance the court dismissed the appeal and upheld the previous order for the remaining contested matters the case involves the application of the inheritance act and the social assistance payments act the court ruled that the inheritance property received by a person who received social welfare assistance is limited to the value of the assistance received the appellant argued that the lower court made an error in limiting the inheritance value and that funeral and nursing home expenses should be reimbursed from the estate the court decided that these expenses are debts of the estate and the responsibility of the deceaseds heirs the judgment has been issued and the appeal was successful in changing the disputed part of the previous order the court determined that 23 of the social assistance received for residential care will be limited in the succession and the remaining contested matters were upheld the appellants claim for reimbursement of expenses was deemed invalid the court of appeal dismissed the appeal upholding the first instance courts order

metadata.subject_of_succession: cash bank account, unpaid pension benefits
